title: Eden Prairie Homeopathy - Floro Chiropractic
description: The NET Homeopathic remedies we use are designed to safely help heal and strengthen your body. Call today to schedule an appointment.
cleaned_text: Homeopathy in Eden Prairie Homeopathy was founded in the late 1700s in Germany. It is based on the idea that " like cures like." Thus if a substance causes symptoms in a healthy person, giving that person a small amount of the same substance may alleviate their symptoms. This is similar to the principle of how a vaccine works. The [NET Homeopathic remedies in Eden Prairie](/) we use are designed to safely help heal and strengthen your body. Benefits of Homeopathy in Eden Prairie Here at Floro Chiropractic in Eden Prairie, we use both Applied Kinesiology Testing to assess which NET homeopathic remedies may be appropriate for your health issues. The NET formulas are free of alcohol, sugar, sodium, and yeast. We have used them successfully on individuals of all ages and they are compatible with vitamins, herbs, and prescription drugs. Feel free to glance and learn of the many applications of the NET homeopathic remedies we use by opening the NET Remedies, Mini Reference Guide to the right. You are also welcome to call our office today with any questions or to schedule an appointment.
